DOC.brief_summary: To compare effect pain two dressing , Mepitel® One UrgoTul® acute wound management .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective , Randomized , Non-inferiority Investigation Compare Effects Mepitel® One UrgoTul® Dressings Acute Wound Management ( Only ) ''
DOC.criteria: 1 . Acute wound : traumatic wound ( dermabrasion , skin tear , ) , benign burn require use dressing 2 . Acute wind size 3 cm² 240 cm2 ( wound could cover 2 investigational product maximum ) 3 . Wound whose duration ≤ 3 day 4 . Both gender age ≥ 18 year 5 . Subject able understand voluntarily sign informed consent 6 . Subject able follow protocol 7 . Subject insured French social security system 1 . Surgical wind 2 . Infected , moderately strongly exudative haemorrhagic wind 3 . Diagnosed underlying disease ( e.g . diabetic neuropathy , stroke , … ) , judge investigator , could interfere pain assessment 4 . Known allergy/hypersensitivity component investigational product 5 . Participation clinical investigation within one month prior start investigation 6 . Pregnant breastfeed woman 7 . Person protect legal regime ( tutorship guardianship )
